channel.title: India on The Outsider's Journey
channel.description: Recent content in India on The Outsider's Journey

item.title: An unfeeling mouth
item.description: I can´t feel most of my mouth. My tongue can move but can´t taste or feel touch. My bottom lip feels like my tongue sticking out of my mouth in a constant pout.

item.title: Reflections on God 6: Radical Atheism
item.description: This is part of God Flux but split into smaller sections for an easier read. Radical Atheism After almost a year of intense email exchanges about god with my friend in Sydney, I went to Edinburgh for my Masters in Neuroscience.

item.title: Our part in world violence (Tibet)
item.description: From May 11, 2008 Violence and aggression rise from fear and greed. What gives the Chinese the right to violate human rights? To kill and torture people?

item.title: The Amazon and us
item.description: First published on August 12, 2007 _“In the time it takes to sing this song, There’ll be four acres cleared in the Amazon. The jungle burns all through the night,
